io.elegie.luchess.web.framework.presenting.freemarker

Class FreemarkerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.web.framework.presenting.freemarker.FreemarkerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    View

    public class FreemarkerView
extends java.lang.Object
implements View
    A view rendered thanks to the Freemarker Template Engine. Note that the view automatically makes available a certain number of methods, which can be used in all templates.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ATTACHMENT_KEY
      Name of the key in the model, which holds the name of the attached file, when present: "attachment".
      static java.lang.String DURATION_KEY
      Name of the FTL function which can be used in templates to normalize durations: "dur".
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_KEY
      Name of the FTL function which can be used in templates to retrieve localized texts: "msg".
      static java.lang.String URL_KEY
      Name of the FTL function which can be used in templates to normalize URLs: "url".
